casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Stevie Douglas IVEY. No. 182P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 11, 2006. Constance E. Widenhouse, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Stevie Douglas Ivey. Robert F. Johnson, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of April 2006 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of April 2006."
